name: Finding the Fundamental Beliefs of the Seventh Day Adventist Church
name_original: Finding the Fundamental Beliefs of the Seventh Day Adventist Church
description:
Search the city to find the 28 fundamental beliefs of the Seventh Day Adventist Church. 

Controls:

use the arrow keys / wsad keys to move around

use space to jump

hold shift while moving to run

esc key pauses the game

navigate the menus with the mouse and select with the left mouse button

Once you find a fundamental belief box, (it will say what the belief is above it and will be numbered) run into it to read more about it. 

Click the left mouse button on the belief reading screen to see if there is any more to read on that particular belief. 

The beliefs don't go away after you read them, so you can feel free to revisit them at any time. Be sure to search all over to find them all!
